alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 1:21AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Holt and northwestern Boyd Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 121 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Naper to near Butte. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Butte, Naper, Anoka and Hull Lake State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 281 between mile markers 217 and 223. Highway 12 between mile markers 90 and 121. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
